channel.title: Where to look for music?
channel.description:
Right, now I am really starting to like all sorts of music (especially electronic), but it's depressing how I can't seem to find/come across music which leaves me uninspired, and if I do find any it is mainstream garbage. Any suggestions as to what I can do? Are there any popular labels you suggest I follow?
I am also just being recommended dubstep or other heavy genres on soundcloud. What do I do?

item.title: Where to look for music?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
I think online record stores bleep.com and boomkat.com are a great place to start.

They’re well curated, and the editorial staff do a fantastic job with descriptions.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to look for music?
item.dc:creator: Twizard
item.description:
I just search for playlists on SoundCloud and Spotify until I find one were I really like the 1 first song, then I listen to a few more songs and if they all sound like the genre I want to listen to I like/save it

Read full topic
